boardgame.name: Palm Island
boardgame.description: Palm Island is a portable game that you can take with you anywhere. Sitting, standing, waiting, riding, flying, relaxing, alone, or together you can play Palm Island no table required._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using a deck transforming mechanic a player uses just 17 cards over 8 rounds to shape their island and overcome its unique challenges. Store resources to pay for upgrades and upgrade buildings to access new abilities. Each decision you make will alter your village from round to round. At the end of 8 rounds calculate your victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each card has four states or positions. The face-up, top section is the active area on each card and represents the card's current state. Through upgrading your cards with rotate and flip allowing you to access the other sections of each card and improve your village by increasing resource production and gaining more victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While playing solo, players can achieve feats by meeting specific criteria during their games. Once they have earned a feat, it's card can be used in all future games. Collect more feats for more abilities and score even more points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While playing with others you may play cooperatively working together to successfully prepare your village before natural disasters strike. These disasters scale based on player count allowing you to combine multiple copies of the game for more players or even play these challenges solo. You can also play competitively racing to recruit valuable new members for you village and use their abilities to score more points than your opponent._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game comes with 2 player decks, competitive cards, cooperative cards and solo feat cards. Multiple games can be combined to add even more players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter Hybrid Plastic card edition. New and unopened. Smoke free home. Will shipped USPS @ $5.50 The Palm Island Hybrid edition comes with plastic waterproof cards in a magnetic flap box. 2 player decks of 17 cards each 9 Feat Cards 5 Co-op cards 14 Competitive Cards 1 Reference card 1 Box 1 Rulebook
In shrink. With one _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Solo Deck Case Add-On_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;
New in shrink Kickstarter edition.
New in shrink Kickstarter edition.
kickstarter edition. played once
New in shrink Kickstarter edition.
Plastic cards, plastic container. Opened, never played.
Played once. The hybrid edition has plastic cards and a magnetically-closed cardboard box. Comes with all Kickstarter extras, including sleeve/case for a single deck.
Plastic cards with cardboard box. Also comes with KS exclusive solo wallet.
This one has the plastic cards in the sturdy cardboard box. I can ship USPS Priority right away!
New in shrink. Kickstarter single deck sleeve not included.
Palm Island Kickstarter Edition with waterproof case. UPS shipping will paid by purchaser.

Got this as an add-on to the Kickstarter as I planned to gift it - but the campaign was delayed and I missed the occasion. Don’t need two copies so selling this on. This is the plastic - all weather - edition and it’s brand new and sealed. Will post 1st class for free in the UK only. Can send to Europe but will have to calculate fees.
With the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Solo Deck Case_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; This deck sleeve/wallet holds one deck and the feat cards for an even more portable game when playing solo.

This edition includes the blue plastic box, and I will also send you the travel wallet that came with the game (it looks like a Button Shy wallet that says _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Palm Island_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;). . Add $5.00 for shipping. I am happy to take payments through PayPal or Venmo.

This is a brand new basic edition with the magnetic clasping box. I’ll also include the branded plastic wallet as a free extra. SHIPPING BELGIUM +5 EUR SHIPPING FRANCE +7 EUR SHIPPING LUXEMBOURG +7 EUR (DPD Pickup) SHIPPING GERMANY + 7EUR (DPD pickup) SHIIPING NETHERLANDS +7EUR (DPD pickup) Other countries ask before ordering

This is a brand new basic edition with the magnetic clasping box. I’ll also include the branded plastic wallet as a free extra. Add £3.99 for 1st class post in the UK . Can send to Europe but will have to calculate fees.
Played 4 or 5 times. Shipping from 30132

Hybrid version - plastic cards with cardboard magnetic flap box. Played once but feels like new (because of the plastic cards). Okay to meet if buyer is in/near downtown Toronto. If shipping, buyer is to pay for shipping, please. Proof of shipping will be provided to buyer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll provide a bubble envelope free-of-charge. Payment can be through paypal, interac e-transfer, or cash on delivery if meeting in person.

* Like New * Completed * All Weather edition with waterproof plastic travel case * Free Palm Island _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Solo Deck Sleeve_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;!! Can be picked up in lower mainland Vancouver.

Brand new; in shrink. Comes from a smoke-free home and ships from 27614 (Raleigh, NC). Local pickup is available in the RTP area. Payment is expected within 24 hours of sale confirmation or I reserve the right to cancel the sale. Please make any inquiries about the item prior to purchasing.

This is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hybrid edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (also known as the Kickstarter edition) of Palm Island, which features plastic waterproof cards inside of a plastic box. This game also comes with a limited edition plastic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;solo deck sleeve,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; which allows for an even more portable way to carry the game. Shipping is $7.00 via USPS Priority Mail. Game ships from Washington, DC.
